body:
So, the topic name is pretty self-explanatory; what're you doing for Halloween? After all, it is in a little less than a week.

I'll either dress up as Proto Badger from Ace Attorney Investigations and carry a prop sword with me (Just look up the intro to "The Kidnapped Turnabout" and you'll see what I mean) or I'll wear my Venom morphsuit, since he's my favorite Marvel villain, other than maybe M.O.D.O.K.

So, what about you?
